description.en: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the sixth Lunar Year. The sixth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Snake.
description.ar: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the sixth Lunar Year. The sixth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Snake.
description.br: Uma capa lindamente trabalhada e adornada com um símbolo que representa o sexto Ano Lunar. O sexto Ano Lunar é dedicado à Serpente.
description.cns: 一件做工精美的披风。披风的图案展示的是第六地支巳，该年的生肖为蛇。
description.de: Trägt das Symbol zum Jahr der Schlange aus dem chinesischen Tierkreiszeichen. Erhöht die Geschicklichkeit um acht.
description.fi: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the sixth Lunar Year. The sixth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Snake.
description.fil: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the sixth Lunar Year. The sixth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Snake.
description.fr: Une Cape magnifiquement conçue, ornée d'un symbole qui représente la sixième Année Lunaire. La sixième Année Lunaire est dédiée au Serpent.
description.id: Jubah yang dibuat dengan indah dihiasi dengan simbol yang mewakili Lunar Year keenam. Lunar Year keenam ini didedikasikan untuk Ular.
description.it: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the sixth Lunar Year. The sixth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Snake.
description.jp: 6番目の月の年を表すシンボルで飾られた美しく細工されたマント。6番目の旧正月は巳に捧げられます。
description.kr: 음력 6 년을 상징하는 상징이 새겨진 아름답게 제작 된 망토입니다. 음력 6 년은 뱀에게 바쳐집니다.
description.nl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the sixth Lunar Year. The sixth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Snake.
description.pl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the sixth Lunar Year. The sixth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Snake.
description.ru: Красивый плащ с символом шестого года китайского календаря - змеей.
description.sp: Una capa bellamente elaborada adornada con un símbolo que representa el sexto Año Lunar. El sexto Año Lunar está dedicado a la Serpiente.
description.sw: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the sixth Lunar Year. The sixth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Snake.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมที่ประดิษฐ์ขึ้นอย่างสวยงามประดับด้วยสัญลักษณ์ที่แสดงถึงปีจันทรคติที่หก ปีจันทรคติที่หกอุทิศให้กับงู
description.tw: 象徵農曆生肖蛇年的斗篷
description.vi: Một chiếc áo choàng được làm thủ công đẹp mắt được trang trí bằng một biểu tượng tượng trưng cho Tết Nguyên đán thứ sáu. Mùng 6 Tết dành riêng cho Quý Tỵ.
